object.name: type
object.sql: select type_name, parameters, fixed_size, max_size_bytes from akiba_information_schema.types
insert into akiba_information_schema.types( type_name, parameters, fixed_size, max_size_bytes ) values (?, ?, ?, ?)
delete from akiba_information_schema.types

object.name: group
object.sql: select group_name from akiba_information_schema.groups
delete from akiba_information_schema.groups

object.name: table
object.sql: select schema_name, table_name, table_type, table_id, group_name, migration_usage from akiba_information_schema.tables
insert into akiba_information_schema.tables( schema_name, table_name, table_type, table_id, group_name, migration_usage ) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
delete from akiba_information_schema.tables

object.name: column
object.sql: select schema_name, table_name, column_name, position, type, type_param_1, type_param_2, nullable, initial_autoinc, group_schema_name, group_table_name, group_column_name, max_storage_size, prefix_size, character_set, collation from akiba_information_schema.columns

insert into akiba_information_schema.columns( schema_name, table_name, column_name, position, type, type_param_1, type_param_2, nullable, initial_autoinc, group_schema_name, group_table_name, group_column_name, max_storage_size, prefix_size, character_set, collation ) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
delete from akiba_information_schema.columns

object.name: join
object.sql: select join_name, parent_schema_name, parent_table_name, child_schema_name, child_table_name, group_name, join_weight, grouping_usage, source_types from akiba_information_schema.joins

insert into akiba_information_schema.joins( join_name, parent_schema_name, parent_table_name, child_schema_name, child_table_name, group_name, join_weight, grouping_usage, source_types ) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
delete from akiba_information_schema.joins

object.name: joinColumn
object.sql: select join_name, parent_schema_name, parent_table_name, parent_column_name, child_schema_name, child_table_name, child_column_name from akiba_information_schema.join_columns

insert into akiba_information_schema.join_columns( join_name, parent_schema_name, parent_table_name, parent_column_name, child_schema_name, child_table_name, child_column_name ) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
delete from akiba_information_schema.join_columns

object.name: index
object.sql: select schema_name, table_name, index_name, index_id, table_constraint, is_unique from akiba_information_schema.indexes
insert into akiba_information_schema.indexes( schema_name, table_name, index_name, index_id, table_constraint, is_unique ) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
delete from akiba_information_schema.indexes

object.name: indexColumn
object.sql: select schema_name, table_name, index_name, column_name, ordinal_position, is_ascending, indexed_length from akiba_information_schema.index_columns
insert into akiba_information_schema.index_columns( schema_name, table_name, index_name, column_name, ordinal_position, is_ascending, indexed_length ) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
delete from akiba_information_schema.index_columns
